BeefUp v1.1.0 A jQuery Accordion Plugin

GitHub

Default 

$('.example1').beefup();

Nested

Open single 1

Open just one accordion at once. 

$('.example2').beefup({
    openSingle: true
});

Open single 2

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit.

Fade animation

Change the animation type to "slide", "fade" or leave empty "". 

$('.example3').beefup({
    animation: 'fade',
    openSpeed: 400,
    closeSpeed: 400
});

Open via JS 

var $beefup = $('.example4').beefup();
$beefup.open($('#beefup'));

Scroll

Scroll to the top of the open accordion. 

$('.example5').beefup({
    scroll: true
});

Callback 

$('.example6').beefup({
    onOpen: function($el) {
        $el.css('border-color', 'red');
    },
    onClose: function($el) {
        $el.css('border-color', '');
    }
});

Self close

Close the accordion on click outside of the element. 

$('.example7').beefup({
    selfClose: true
});

Use HTML5 data attributes 

$('.example8').beefup();

<article class="beefup example9" data-beefup-options='{"animation": "", "openSpeed": 800}'>
